lines.line: Hello monk.
Hello adventurer. My name is Brother Kojo. Do you happen to know the time?
No, sorry, I don't.
Exactly! This clock tower has recently broken down, and without it nobody can tell the correct time. I must fix it before the town people become too angry!
I don't suppose you could assist me in the repairs? I'll pay you for your help.
OK old monk, what can I do?
Oh, thank you kind adventurer! In the cellar below, you'll find four cogs. They're too heavy for me, but you should be able to carry them one at a time.
I know one goes on each floor... but I can't exactly remember which goes where specifically. Oh well, I'm sure you can figure it out fairly easily.
Well, I'll do my best.
Thank you again! And remember to be careful, the cellar is full of strange beasts!
Not now old monk.
OK then. Come back and let me know if you change your mind.
Hello again.
Oh hello, are you having trouble? The cogs are in four rooms below us. Place one cog on a pole on each of the four tower levels.
Right, gotcha. I'll do that then.
I've placed a cog!
That's great. Come see me when you've done the other three.
Two down!
Two to go.
One left.
I have replaced all the cogs!
Really..? Wait, listen! Well done, well done! Yes yes yes, you've done it! You ARE clever!
The townsfolk will all be able to know the correct time now! Thank you so much for all of your help! And as promised, here is your reward!

characters.name: Brother Kojo
characters.description: Elderly male, British accent, gentle and patient tone, a peaceful Saradominist monk who oversees the Clock Tower with quiet dedication and mild-mannered urgency when problems arise.
